LearningScenario.name: Open and Close Case
LearningScenario.scenariocontexthint: In this learning scenario, in addition to seeing how to open a case, We will also see what should we do if the given solution is not working

vertex.activitycontexthint: Imagine we got a problem with our computer: The internet is not working. What would you do? First, You open a ticket to the general support providing them with the information about your problem. This is the task window to open the case. Fill the details in the below taskform as asked.

You described your problem, and the General Support gave you a solution. (Both are visible in the below form). Now you found out that the solution is working (Imagine it is working ;)). Now the next step for you is to either close the case if the solution is working or say it is not working after which you will be asked to provide additional information. In our imaginary scenario the solution is working, so choose the option accordingly.
